name: Dream Jetpack (WIP)
description:
Dream Jetpack! 

Play as Tish, an experienced Dreamist, tasked with cleaning the world of nightmares and fears. Shoot your way through enemies as you get to the heart of fears.

WASD: Move
Space: Jetpack/Accept
Arrow keys: Shoot
Space: Pause/Unpause

The phone switch on the title screen can toggle the mobile overlay.
